name: MCFIT IS BACK FOR YOU
description: What did we miss you! High time to say THANK YOU. Thank you for your loyalty, your support and your patience.

name: MCFIT PROUD CLUB
description: With the PROUD CLUB, your loyalty will finally be rewarded. The longer you have been training with us, the more benefits you will get..

name: FOR MORE BUDDY BUILDING
description: Grab your buddy, come to the studio and experience the endless training possibilities at McFIT together: live courses.

name: YOUR BODY BUILDER
description: Now you can experience something - with the new live course training in your McFIT studio, powered by CYBEROBICS!

name: YOUR CYBEROBICS LIVE CLASSES
description: The willingness to help one another has become extremely important in these times.

name: START YOUR TRAINING
description: With an emergency aid program, we were able to give financial assistance to employees whose situation had been made considerably more difficult by the current situation.
